--create topic testtopic1;
use test;
0 rows returned
create source test_source_1(
    col0_1 bigint,
    col1_1 tinyint,
    col2_1 int,
    col3_1 double,
    col4_1 decimal(10, 2),
    col5_1 varchar,
    col6_1 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0_1)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic1",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1,
        v2,
        v3,
        v4,
        v5,
        v6
    )
);
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_1 as select * from test_source_1;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_1 order by col0_1;
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0_1               | col1_1 | col2_1      | col3_1      | col4_1      | col5_1      | col6_1                     |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1;
select * from test_mv_1 order by col0_1;
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0_1               | col1_1 | col2_1      | col3_1      | col4_1      | col5_1      | col6_1                     |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1                    | 10     | 1000        | 1234.432100 | 12345678.99 | str1        | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 |
| 2                    | 20     | 2000        | 2234.432100 | 22345678.99 | str2        | 2020-01-02 01:00:00.123456 |
| 3                    | 30     | 3000        | 3234.432100 | 32345678.99 | str3        | 2020-01-03 01:00:00.123456 |
| 4                    | 40     | 4000        | 4234.432100 | 42345678.99 | str4        | 2020-01-04 01:00:00.123456 |
| 5                    | 50     | 5000        | 5234.432100 | 52345678.99 | str5        | 2020-01-05 01:00:00.123456 |
| 6                    | 60     | 6000        | 6234.432100 | 62345678.99 | str6        | 2020-01-06 01:00:00.123456 |
| 7                    | 70     | 7000        | 7234.432100 | 72345678.99 | str7        | 2020-01-07 01:00:00.123456 |
| 8                    | 80     | 8000        | 8234.432100 | 82345678.99 | str8        | 2020-01-08 01:00:00.123456 |
| 9                    | 90     | 9000        | 9234.432100 | 92345678.99 | str9        | 2020-01-09 01:00:00.123456 |
| 10                   | 100    | 10000       | 10234.432.. | 93345678.99 | str10       | 2020-01-10 01:00:00.123456 |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
10 rows returned

--create topic testtopic2;
create source test_source_2(
    col0_2 bigint,
    col1_2 tinyint,
    col2_2 int,
    col3_2 double,
    col4_2 decimal(10, 2),
    col5_2 varchar,
    col6_2 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0_2)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic2",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1,
        v2,
        v3,
        v4,
        v5,
        v6
    )
);
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_2 as select * from test_source_2;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_2 order by col0_2;
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0_2               | col1_2 | col2_2      | col3_2      | col4_2      | col5_2      | col6_2                     |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_2;
select * from test_mv_2 order by col0_2;

| 1                    | 11     | 1000        | 1234.432100 | 12345678.99 | str1        | 2020-01-01 01:00:00.123456 |
| 2                    | 12     | 2000        | 2234.432100 | 22345678.99 | str2        | 2020-01-02 01:00:00.123456 |

--create topic testtopic3;
create source test_source_3(
    col0_3 bigint,
    col1_3 tinyint,
    col2_3 int,
    col3_3 double,
    col4_3 decimal(10, 2),
    col5_3 varchar,
    col6_3 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0_3)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic3",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        meta("key").k0,
        v1,
        v2,
        v3,
        v4,
        v5,
        v6
    )
);
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_3 as select * from test_source_3;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_3 order by col0_3;
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| col0_3               | col1_3 | col2_3      | col3_3      | col4_3      | col5_3      | col6_3                     |
+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
0 rows returned

--try and create mv with same name;
create materialized view test_mv_3 as select * from test_source_3;
Failed to execute statement: PDB1007 - Materialized view test.test_mv_3 already exists

drop materialized view test_mv_3;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv3 order by col0_3;
Failed to execute statement: PDB1000 - Table 'test.test_mv3' doesn't exist

drop materialized view test_mv_2;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv2 order by col0_2;
Failed to execute statement: PDB1000 - Table 'test.test_mv2' doesn't exist

drop materialized view test_mv_1;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv1 order by col0_1;
Failed to execute statement: PDB1000 - Table 'test.test_mv1' doesn't exist

--recreate mv;
create materialized view test_mv_1 as select * from test_source_1;
0 rows returned

--try and drop it again;
drop materialized view test_mv_1;
Failed to execute statement: PDB1003 - Unknown materialized view: test.test_mv_1

drop source test_source_2;
0 rows returned
drop source test_source_3;

drop source test_source_1;

--delete topic testtopic3;
--delete topic testtopic2;
--delete topic testtopic1;
